title: Cant connect to game after champ select
body: After champion pick i cant connect to the loading screen pls help me

replies.body: Without much more info, it kind of sounds like your client can't establish the connection it needs when the loading screen begins. It could be due to closed ports so let's be sure to adjust your [**port forwarding and your DNS settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) really quickly first off. Also be sure to check out your firewalls and antivirus settings just in case League is being blocked by those.
I just flushed my dns and changed it to googled dns, I still get the bug

This same thing happens to me, after champ select my screen goes black and the game never loads.  After 10 min of the black screen I force quit league and opened it again, it just said reconnect after I logged back in, and the same thing black screen thing would happen again.  This only happened to me after the latest patch with the cool godstaffjax and stuff,
